name: Fishy Fighty
description:
A casual strategy game in which you build a small army of fish, and fight other fish.

The only resource is time. Do you build lots of weak, tiny fish for a quick attack? Or do you build big, bulky fish - leaving yourself defenseless while they spawn?

My work on this project was as Designer.

Art by Annika Morris (https://twitter.com/anneeeeeka)

Programming and original concept by Rowan Reeve.
